fields.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth (C1)
fields.value: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously by 2.

fields.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade (C2)
fields.value: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

fields.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless (C4)
fields.value: Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

fields.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Planet Befall by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator (C6)
fields.value:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.
